questions.question: What is the Reduced Earth?
questions.answer: The smaller, imaginary globe that gets projected on to the paper to make a chart.

questions.question: What is the chart scale?
questions.answer: The ratio of a given chart length to the distance on Earth it represents.

questions.question: A (larger/smaller) area of the Earth is represented on a 1:250,000 compared to a 1:500,000 chart.
A (greater,lesser) level of detail is shown on a 1:1,000,000 chart compared to a 1:250,000 chart.

The VPC is used primarily for __________. It shows __________ and __________ information, and is based on the __________ Projection.
questions.answer: Visual navigation planning. Topographical, cultural. New Zealand Map Grid.

questions.question: VNCs are used for __________. They cover _____ airspace in New Zealand and show detailed __________, __________, and __________ information. They are based on the __________ Projection.
questions.answer: In-flight navigation. All. topographical, cultural, aeronautical. New Zealand Map Grid.
